amendment.description: An amendment numbered 43 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to prohibit the use of funds to pay the salary and expenses of DHS Director of Departmental GAO-OIG Liaison Office Jim Crumpacker.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 264 (Roll no. 450).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 264 (Roll no. 450).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
